title: Emilia Clarke smartens up her denim with a full-length trench as she steps out in New York
text:
Emilia Clarke smartened up her denim with a trench as she stepped out in New York on Monday afternoon.

The 33-year-old embraced the fall in her seasonal look while leaving the Whitby Hotel in New York City.

Emilia stopped to sign a few autographs for fans after leaving the Big Apple hotel.

Fall ready: Emilia Clarke rocked a fall-ready look as she stepped out in New York City on Monday afternoon

Clarke wore a simple white top under her full-length tan overcoat which fell just inches above the ground.

The Game of Thrones star had her hair pulled back with small diamond earrings plus wide-legged blue jeans and brown boots.

The actress completed her look with a rather large bag that matched her coat as she stepped out into the street.

Emilia's look: Clarke wore a simple white top under her full-length tan overcoat which fell just inches above the ground

Clarke is in town for the New York City premiere of her upcoming film Last Christmas, which takes place Tuesday, October 29 in Manhattan.

The film, which she stars in alongside Henry Golding (Crazy Rich Asians), hits theaters November 8.

The story follows Clarke's character, Kate, who takes a job working as a department store elf over Christmas, where she meets the man of her dreams, Tom (Golding).

Autographs: The actress even stopped to sign a few autographs for fans after leaving the hotel

Clarke also stars in the action-thriller Above Suspicion with Jack Huston and Thora Birch, which is still in post-production and doesn't have a release date yet.

The actress is coming off her epic eight-season run on HBO's Game of Thrones, which ended with an epic series finale in May.

The show won 12 Emmys for the final season, including Peter Dinklage for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series and the most coveted award fro Outstanding Drama Series.

Coming soon: Clarke also stars in the action-thriller Above Suspicion with Jack Huston and Thora Birch, which is still in post-production and doesn't have a release date yet

The actress just turned 33 years old last week, and she set the Internet ablaze with an Instagram photo where she reunited with a pair of her on-screen Game of Thrones lovers: Jason Momoa and Kit Harington.

Momoa played the Dothraki leader Khal Drogo in Season 1 of Game of Thrones before the character's untimely death.

Clarke's character, Daenerys Targaryen, was ultimately killed by her then-lover Jon Snow, played by Kit Harington, in the series finale.
description: Emilia Clarke rocked a fall-ready look as she stepped out in New York City on Monday afternoon.
